titleStmt.title: An excellent new song, call'd, The languishing swain: or, The hard-hearted shepherdess. To a pleasant new play-tune. Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J[osiah]. Blare, at the sign of the Looking-Glass on London-Bridge.,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication and publisher's name from Wing.
Verse: "Happy's the man that's free from love ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
